favourite.article: Lord, look into me and infuse me with Yourself. Like Moses, I want to spend time with You as your companion, to know You intimately face to face. I don't want to just merely know about teachings. I want to know Your ways, that I may know my God!
Powerful words in time like this. Lord, we need You. Only with You we can fine peace and rest. When the devil attack us those are the words we have to run to for refuge. God bless.
Please Lord Speak Softly To Me, Come In, Subdue Me, Deep In Your Love I Hide.
Speak softly to me, come in, subdue me; in Your strength, Lord, take me through.

Such a simple, yet vital song that we should sing everyday. "Lord we need You. May we never think that we can live apart from You. Lift our eyes to gaze upon You. May we walk by the strength of Your eyes."
Amen! Lord, thank You for Your love. Only deep in Your love we can hide... Thank You that we can still lift up our eyes to gaze on You! Oh, how we need You always!

This song touched me so much that I wept while singing along with the CD "The Comfort Abounds". As Christians, the phrase "To live this life, I need You always" is so true! The song ends with "In Your strength, Lord, take me through." --this is just a prayer of the one as lily, leaning on her Lord and lover!
Thank You for being so subjective, Lord.

During the times when our natural strength fails the Lord will carry us on eagle's wings which signifies God's grace. He is our High Priest who sympathizes, helps, nourishes us with bread and wine to succor us in every situation. Thank You Lord! We love You Lord Jesus! We need You Lord Jesus!
To live this life, Lord, I need You always!

Lord,I need You! I need You always! Lord, take lead! Lord embrace me, bear me in You... And when I'm weak, Lord, and can't go on more, please Lord, do lift my eyes to gaze on You...make me... Speak softly to me, Come in...Lord, come in!...subdue me; In Your strength, Lord, take me through.

Lord, I love you. To live this life, Lord, I need You always. Lord, take lead.
When I'm weak, Lord, and I can't go on more, Lift my eyes that I may gaze on You. Speak softly to me, come in and subdue me. In Your strength Lord, take me through.
Amen. To live this life, I do need Him always. to come in, subdue me, and take through in His strength.

Amen Lord You're the One I need. Only You satisfy. All other satisfaction is short-term. But satisfaction in You endures, sustains me, and quenches the thirst. I praise You as the true satisfaction. Hallelujah.
There is nothing sweeter than to hide in His love, recognizing we are nothing and He is our everything. We need You Lord.
Praise the Lord! Lord I need YOU! Speak softly to me. Infuse me! Bear me!

It is when we have exhausted all that we have and all that we are, weak and can't go on, then the Lord can truly have a way in our being. Have your way in me, Lord Jesus. Lord embrace me in Your love, lift my eyes that I may go on in You.
